author: Matthew Champion
title: Prince Charles Has Tested Positive For The Coronavirus
description: The Prince of Wales has been displaying mild symptoms but otherwise remains in good health, a statement from the royal family said. View Entire Post ›
content:
Prince Charles has tested positive for the coronavirus.
The Prince of Wales, 71, is in good health despite showing mild symptoms, a statement from Clarence House said.
